name: NirankariSatguruMataJiDiscourses
0:
”Alexa, open satguru discourses”
”Alexa, ask satguru discourses for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start satguru discourses”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: satguru discourses
des:
Listen to the latest discourses of Satguru Mata Sudiksha Ji from your Sant Nirankari Mission.
The skill content is in the Hindi Language.
You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. 
You can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next". 
This skill was created by Sant Nirankari Mission
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
